version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: Fix for subsequent notes being cut early.

version.author: Matt Horn
version.changelog: - Added "Next Pattern" for better automation of pattern switching

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: bug fixes, added graphics for fun and to start to gain compatibility with ReaRack

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: + improved keyboard (priority to last or highest note) + added tremolo + added ModWheel/Aftertouch vibrato depth + added Pitch bend +- 1 octave + modified Seq gains can be negative (opposite phase) + modified Seq. init to fundamental seq

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: # Note off bug corrected + improved keyboard (priority to last or highest note) + added tremolo + added ModWheel/Aftertouch vibrato depth + added Pitch bend +- 1 octave + modified Seq gains can be negative (opposite phase) + modified Seq. init to fundamental seq

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: + ADSR enveloppe + Selectable velocity curve # Brilliance and Character + modwheel Vibrato depth + After touch sensitive Vibrato speed + Pitch bend +-1 octave + Tremulant rate (detune between operators) + phase modulation synthesis (3 operators per note) + Per note index limitation (anti aliasing)

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: # note off bug + ADSR enveloppe + Selectable velocity curve # Brilliance and Character + modwheel Vibrato depth + After touch sensitive Vibrato speed + Pitch bend +-1 octave + Tremulant rate (detune between operators) + phase modulation synthesis (3 operators per note) + Per note index limitation (anti aliasing)

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: version 1.2 # 4 New "Characters": Bell, Reed, Harmonica and Nasillard. + Velocity sensitive atteck time + MIDI control of A D S R Brilliance and Character (CC 73 75 76 72 74 and 71) + All notes off on play_state != 1 && play_state != 5 + All notes off on "All Sounds Off" (CC 120) version 1.1 # Off gate -20dB than before version 1.02 + ADSR enveloppe + Selectable velocity curve # Brilliance and Character + modwheel Vibrato depth + After touch sensitive Vibrato speed + Pitch bend +-1 octave + Tremulant rate (detune between operators) + phase modulation synthesis (3 operators per note) + Per note index limitation (anti aliasing)

version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Bug fix for Additive Oscillator, the master/slave function was not working, now fixed.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Various bug fixes for LFO 2 frequency modulation function.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Bug fixes for LFO 2, trapezoidal oscillator and additive oscillator.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.0.1 - 16/01/2018 Added Moog Filter module. Version 2.0.0 - 12/12/2017 All modules updated to version 2.0.0.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.0.2 - 17/01/2018 Moog Filter module zipper noised fixed. Version 2.0.1 - 16/01/2018 Added Moog Filter module. Version 2.0.0 - 12/12/2017 All modules updated to version 2.0.0.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.1.0 - 14/02/2018 Added MIDI Nonlinearizer module. Added latch trigger mode to envelope generator. Fixed a bug in envelope generator which prevented legato trigger modes from working. 15 modules updated to improve CC encoding/decoding accuracy (bug led to CC vales of 128 being output occasionally). Fixed a bug in CC Mixer module (wrong output channel).

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.2.0 - 21/02/2018 Important - Fixed a bug in CC Mixer module (no output). Features added - Oscillators (except Noise) and KS Delay now respond to MIDI pitch bend messages for pitch control. Pitch bend and pitch modulation by CC can be summed together. Oscillators have an additional 'Master pitch modulation range' slider.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.2.1 - 25/02/2018 Updated the Poly Splitter module to accept note-on with velocity = 0 as note-off.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.3.0 - 25/07/2018 Added Envelope Multi-Tool & MIDI Mixer. Updated Non Lineraizer and Amplifier. Deleted CC Mixer.

version.author: Corey Scogin
version.changelog: Removed the linear to dB conversions. All attenuation values calculated directly now. Clear the buffer when the window changes. Keeping old buffer values would result in unexpected behavior. Added the freembuf call to indicate how much memory is used.

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: Added Muting Notification CC value slider

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: Added Muting Notification CC value slider

reapack.desc: Faders to trim 32-channels by same amount in stereo pairs
